## hpr4016 :: Today I learnt

 Introduction:
In this episode I continue the series "Today I learnt.." which was
started by Dave
Morriss in HPR 4002
Show notes:
I mention that I first tried to remove the password from my pdf using
the excellent pdf manipulation program Okular recommended to me by Dave
Morriss.
After some googling I found the following solution
to my password protected PDF.
The command line program I used to remove the password from my pdf
was qpdf.
This is the
Man page documentation for qpdf
This is the command I used to remove the password in my pdf
Qpdf â€”decrypt protected.pdf unprotected.pdf
